Statute.Title: Retail Payment Activities Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Activités associées aux paiements de détail, Loi sur les)

Item.Text: — ss. 1 to 10, 12 to 16 and 61, ss. 62(1), (3) and (4) and s. 63, as enacted by s. 177, in force on assent 29.06.2021, see s. 187(1)
— ss. 11, 28 to 44, 49 and 51, ss. 62(2) and ss. 64 to 98 and 101 to 108, as enacted by s. 177 in force 01.11.2024 see SI/2023-70, (a)(i)
— s. 23, as enacted by s. 177 in force 16.11.2024 see SI/2023-70, (b)
— ss. 17 to 22, 24 to 27, 45 to 48, 50 and 52 to 60, as enacted by s. 177, in force 08.09.2025 see SI/2023-70, (c)
